Key Match Events: The New York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets 111-109 on Oct. 6 and followed that up with a dominant 117-94 win over the Washington Wizards on Wednesday.
Pre-Game Insights: Jalen Brunson is healthy but will not suit up for the Knicks for their fourth preseason game.
Post-Match Reflections: Jalen Brunson is unfazed by outside noise as Knicks prepare for 2024/25 NBA season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Knicks finished second in the East with an impressive 50-32 record.
Others: The Knicks will close out their preseason on Friday against the Wizards at Capital One Arena in Washington, D.C.
